Articles.Content:
The challenge is simple.

Build the most minimal design needed to:

1) Go to the Mun and into orbit around it

2) Go to the Mun, orbit it a few time and then return

3) Go to the Mun and land on it

4) Go to the Mun, land on it and then return

5) Go to the Mun, land on it, return into orbit for a couple of times and then return
I do hope you\'re saying build five separate designs and not one that can do all of those.
Of course I say separate designs. I also say only vanilla parts.
How about one that can orbit the mun, land back on Kerbin, and then land on the mun again and come back!

Of course I say separate designs. I also say only vanilla parts.

I\'m outta here :-[

This one has done number 3. It might be able to lose the second set of boosters.

With a more capable pilot, I think 4 and 5 are doable.

I\'m not sure why you have 5 at all actually, getting back into munar orbit is step one of going home.

I lost all the boosters and made another mun landing.
